input.sentences: family was getting together in the city

dad was happy to eat some food

output.sentences: Margie's family was visiting her in the city.
They decided stop for a hot lunch.
Her brother was happy to eat the delicious food.
They sat in the restaurant and talked all afternoon.
Soon it was time to call it a day and go home.
